repl_description:
An advanced psychological performance analytics platform delivering comprehensive administrative insights through intelligent technology.

Key Technologies:
- React.js with TypeScript for responsive frontend
- Machine learning-powered psychological profiling
- Drizzle ORM for scalable database interactions
- Advanced error tracking and WebSocket-enabled real-time API management
- Granular admin access control system
- Robust server-side authentication mechanisms

Current focus on resolving API token fetching challenges, improving authentication reliability, and enhancing server-side error handling with optimized WebSocket communication.
